steps.description: Log in to the ShypBUDDY Dashboard.
From the dashboard, click on the 'Recharge' option.
Input the desired amount you want to add to your wallet.
Click the 'Proceed' button to continue to the payment stage.
Choose a preferable payment mode such as UPI, Net Banking, Credit/Debit Card, etc.
Complete the payment process using the selected payment mode.
After a successful transaction, the amount will be credited to your wallet.
